attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in this government
attributes.additional_details:
Tell us more about why you want the Government or Parliament to do this. 
Inability to understand the science of Covid , wilfully sacrificing peoples lives , failing to tender PPE and PPE contracts in a robust manner, mismanaging a vital Track and Trace, forcing an unwanted No-Deal Brexit on the British public, refusing to uphold Food Standards and sacrificing British Farmers
attributes.background: Debate the competence of the current Government to govern

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.
